```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

Load library:

```{r}
library(pirouette)
```

Create the true phylogeny:

```{r}
crown_age <- 2
true_phylogeny <- ape::read.tree(text = "((A:1,B:1):2,C:3);")
```

### Old

```{r}
out <- pirouette::pir_run(
  phylogeny = ape::read.tree(text = "((A:1,B:1):2,C:3);"),
  sequence_length = 8,
  mcmc = beautier::create_mcmc(chain_length = 2000),
  mutation_rate = 0.0
)
```
